description: Use csm-data to query the results api and store it in a csv file, you need to add your arguments for filename and query while using this template

CSM_DATASET_ABSOLUTE_PATH.description: Target folder in which to write the resulting CSV file

CSM_ORGANIZATION_ID.description: An organization id for the Cosmo Tech API

CSM_WORKSPACE_ID.description: A workspace id for the Cosmo Tech API

CSM_RUNNER_ID.description: A runner id for the Cosmo Tech API

CSM_RUN_ID.description: A run id for the Cosmo Tech API
